amendment.description: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the FTC's suspension of early termination to premerger notification filings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
